description: "Unusually, north is located to the left of this map of East Asia, rather than the top. The text notes that shallows and reefs are marked, and that the map is based on the explorations of Portuguese ships. Illustrations include sea monsters and ships."
title: "Exacta   &   accurata   delineatis   cum   orarum   maritimarum   tum   etjam   locorum   terrestrium   qvae   in   regionibus   China,   Cauchinchina,   Camboja,   Syao,   Malacca,   Arracan   &   Pegu"
